00010 //Jump
00011 #define JMP(address) \
00012         _asm{mov eax, address} \
00013         _asm{jmp eax}
00014 
00015 //MSVC++ stackframes
00016 #define EPILOG_THISCALL \
00017         _asm{pop ecx} \
00018         _asm{mov esp, ebp} \
00019         _asm{pop ebp}
00020 
00021 #define JMP_THIS(address) \
00022         { EPILOG_THISCALL; \
00023         JMP(address); }
00024 
00025 #define EPILOG_STDCALL \
00026         _asm{mov esp, ebp} \
00027         _asm{pop ebp}
00028 
00029 #define JMP_STD(address) \
00030         { EPILOG_STDCALL; \
00031         JMP(address); }

00033 //Get/set register to a variable
00034 #define GET_REG32(dst,reg) _asm{mov dst, reg}
00035 #define SET_REG32(reg,src) _asm{mov reg, src}
00036 
00037 #define ZERO_REG(reg) _asm{xor reg, reg}
00038

00040 #define SET_REG8(reg,src) _asm{mov reg, src}

00044 #define SUB_ESP(i) _asm{sub esp, i}
00045 
00046 //Push immediate value
00047 #define PUSH_IMM(i) _asm{push i}
00048 
00049 //Push / Pop register
00050 #define PUSH_REG(r) _asm{push r}
00051 #define POP_REG(r) _asm{pop r}
00052 
00053 //Push a pointer to a variable
00054 #define PUSH_PTR(v) \
00055                 _asm{lea eax, v}\
00056                 _asm{push eax}
00057 
00058 //Push a variable
00059 #define PUSH_VAR32(v) \
00060                 _asm{mov eax, v}\
00061                 _asm{push eax}
00062 
00063 //Push 16bit variable
00064 #define PUSH_VAR16(v) \
00065                 _asm{movzx eax, v}\
00066                 _asm{push eax}
00067 
00068 //Push 8bit variable
00069 #define PUSH_VAR8(v) \
00070                 _asm{movzx eax, v}\
00071                 _asm{push eax}
00072 
00073 //Push 64bit variable
00074 #define PUSH_VAR64(pv) \
00075                 _asm{mov eax, pv}\
00076                 _asm{mov ecx, [eax+4]}\
00077                 _asm{mov eax, [eax]}\
00078                 _asm{push ecx}\
00079                 _asm{push eax}
00080 
00081 //call
00082 #define CALL(pFunction) \
00083                 _asm{mov eax, pFunction}\
00084                 _asm{call eax}
00085 
00086 //THISCALL macros
00087 #define THISCALL(pFunction) \
00088                 _asm{mov ecx, this}\
00089                 _asm{mov eax, pFunction}\
00090                 _asm{call eax}
00091 
00092 #define THISCALL_EX(pThis,pFunction) \
00093                 _asm{mov ecx, pThis}\
00094                 _asm{mov eax, pFunction}\
00095                 _asm{call eax}
00096 
00097 #define THISCALL_VT(vt_offs) \
00098                 _asm{mov ecx, this}\
00099                 _asm{mov eax, [ecx]}\
00100                 _asm{call dword ptr [eax+vt_offs]}
00101 
00102 #define CALL_VT(vt_offs) \
00103                 _asm{mov eax, [ecx]}\
00104                 _asm{call dword ptr [eax+vt_offs]}
00105 
00106 #define THISCALL_EX_VT(pThis,vt_offs) \
00107                 _asm{mov ecx, pThis}\
00108                 _asm{mov edx, [ecx]}\
00109                 _asm{call dword ptr [edx+vt_offs]}
00110 
00111 //read or write memory
00112 #define MEM_READ8(dst,mem) \
00113                 _asm{mov dl, byte ptr ds:mem}\
00114                 _asm{mov dst, dl}
00115 #define MEM_WRITE8(mem,src) \
00116                 _asm{mov dl, dst}\
00117                 _asm{mov byte ptr ds:mem, dl}
00118 
00119 #define MEM_READ16(dst,mem) \
00120                 _asm{mov dx, word ptr ds:mem}\
00121                 _asm{mov dst, dx}
00122 #define MEM_WRITE16(mem,src) \
00123                 _asm{mov dx, src}\
00124                 _asm{mov word ptr ds:mem, dx}
00125 
00126 #define MEM_READ32(dst,mem) \
00127                 _asm{mov edx, dword ptr ds:mem}\
00128                 _asm{mov dst, edx}
00129 #define MEM_WRITE32(mem,src) \
00130                 _asm{mov edx, src}\
00131                 _asm{mov dword ptr ds:mem, edx}
00132

00134 #define MEM_WRITEIMM16(mem,imm) _asm{mov word ptr ds:mem, imm}
00135 #define MEM_WRITEIMM32(mem,imm) _asm{mov dword ptr ds:mem, imm}
